tspan.tspan: A candlestick chart allows you to summarize a course over a certain time period!
Basically: If the candlestick is green/bright, the price is currently at the top end!
If the candlestick is red/dark, the price is currently at the bottom end!
The "shadow" - the lines from the candlestick to the minimum and maximum -
can tell you whether a price might move even further in a certain direction!
Close: the final price of the period
Open: the first price of the period
